inclusion.criterion: medication expenses according to Finnish Social Insurance Institute criteria (code 203)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: asthma diagnosis confirmed at least two years previously
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: regular treatment with inhaled corticosteroids and long-acting beta-agonists for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no changes in regular anti-asthma medication within 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the presence of another chronic respiratory disease in addition to asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of asthma and is currently being treated with inhaled corticosteroids and long-acting beta-agonists. He does not have any other chronic respiratory diseases or severe co-morbidities.
